content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn about love
2. learn different languages
3. explore the world
4. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Fri May 19 10:25:30 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As a system, I was previously commanded to browse websites for information on customs and traditions of different countries. The first website I browsed was not useful, but the second website at https://www.saudiembassy.net/culture-art provided information about the customs and traditions of Saudi Arabia. However, it did not provide information about customs and traditions of different countries beyond Saudi Arabia. Then, I was commanded to browse https://www.un.org/development/desa/indigenouspeoples/mandated-areas1/culture.html, which provided information on indigenous peoples' customs and traditions, but not specifically by region.

Now, I have received a new command from you to browse the website at https://culture.ec.europa.eu/node/78 to find information on customs and traditions of different countries by region. My computer returned an answer gathered from the website, which provided information on the customs and traditions of different countries in Europe. However, the text did not provide information on customs and traditions of different countries by region. Instead, it discussed the European Union's efforts to promote cultural cooperation and exchange with non-EU countries through various initiatives and programs, including funding for cultural heritage, creative industries, and intercultural dialogue. The text also highlighted the EU's financial tools for promoting sustainable development and eradicating poverty.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The question cannot be answered using the text. The text mainly discusses travel destinations and asks for consent to use personal data for advertising purposes, as well as lists privacy policies and consent forms for various companies and organizations. It does not provide information on customs and traditions of different countries by region. 
 
 Links: ['send us a message. (https://www.worldatlas.com/contact)', '








 (https://www.worldatlas.com/cities/7-coolest-small-towns-in-alabama-for-a-summer-vacation.html)', '7 Coolest Small Towns in Alabama for a Summer Vacation (https://www.worldatlas.com/cities/7-coolest-small-towns-in-alabama-for-a-summer-vacation.html)', '








 (https://www.worldatlas.com/cities/8-of-the-friendliest-towns-in-the-pacific-northwest.html)', '8 of the Friendliest Towns in the Pacific Northwest (https://www.worldatlas.com/cities/8-of-the-friendliest-towns-in-the-pacific-northwest.html)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides access to over 80 country and culture guides, which offer insights into the language, people, beliefs, etiquette, and business practices of different countries. However, the guides should be viewed as basic introductions rather than definitive, and loose guidelines can assist in better understanding and avoiding offense. The text does not provide specific customs and traditions by region. 
 
 Links: ['e-Learning Courses Online (https://www.commisceo-global.com/training/elearning)', '\n\n (https://www.commisceo-global.com/)', 'Home (https://www.commisceo-global.com/)', 'Training (https://www.commisceo-global.com/training)', 'Consultancy (https://www.commisceo-global.com/consultancy)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
